articles.description: The Indian men's team, featuring Achanta Sharath Kamal, G Sathiyan and Harmeet Desai, pummeled Singapore 3-0 to assure themselves of a medal.
articles.content:
Indian men's team cruised to the semifinals, while the women's team was knocked out of the 26th ITTF-Asian Table Tennis Championships 2023 in Pyeongchang, South Korea, on Monday.

articles.title: "Padosiyon Se Pyaar Karna...": Virat Kohli Fangirl From Pakistan Goes Viral. Watch | Cricket News - NDTV Sports
articles.description: A video of Virat Kohli's fangirl from Pakistan is going viral on social media. The fan could be seen picking India's star batter Kohli over Pakistan captain Babar Azam.

articles.title: Australia's white-ball stars continue fine form ahead of World Cup - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Australia have issued a warning ahead of the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup with a clinical 3-0 sweep over South Africa in their T20I series in Durban.
